author: Lauren Vella
title: Ammon Bundy still plans to hold Easter gathering despite social distancing requirements
description: Ammon Bundy, the rancher involved in two armed standoffs with the federal government over grazing rights in the western United States, said that he plans to hold a large Easter gathering in Idaho despite the state's stay-...
